name: Hung On Justice
description:
This is an entry for Ludum Dare 47 https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/47/hung-on-justice

Hung by a group of bandits, you survived and now seek revenge.

Give them the rope they so eagerly gave you.

A/D to Move
W/Space to Jump
S to Fall Through Platforms
Left Click + Hold to Charge Noose
Release Left Click to Throw Noose

The bullets in the top left represent your health.

Kill all bandits to win!

This game was made in collaboration with @peter1987

The only things we didn't make ourselves are the sound when you hit the start button, and the fonts used.

https://freesound.org/people/YleArkisto/sounds/410370/
https://www.1001fonts.com/cowboys-font.html

What We Used
Godot
Paint.net, Photoshop, Piskel
Audacity
Freesound.org for the start button sound https://freesound.org/people/YleArkisto/sounds/410370/
beepbox for making music
Chiptone for sounds
Gifcam for gifs
